meanings.definition: The act of buying and selling goods or services for a commission.
meanings.sent1: In the world of brokings, brokers help people buy and sell things.
meanings.sent2: She made a living through brokings, connecting buyers with sellers.
meanings.sent3: The brokings business was booming, with brokers busily matching clients.
meanings.sent4: His expertise in brokings turned him into a master dealmaker.
meanings.sent5: The art of brokings requires a keen eye for opportunities.

meanings.definition: The business of acting as an intermediary in negotiations between buyers and sellers.
meanings.sent1: Brokings involve facilitating deals between parties who need help.
meanings.sent2: The success of brokings relies on building trust between buyers and sellers.
meanings.sent3: The brokings firm was known for its fair and efficient services.
meanings.sent4: She navigated the complex world of brokings with ease.
meanings.sent5: Effective brokings require clear communication and understanding.

meanings.definition: The act of arranging or negotiating a deal.
meanings.sent1: His skill in brokings led to successful agreements for his clients.
meanings.sent2: Brokings involve finding common ground between parties in a negotiation.
meanings.sent3: The art of brokings requires patience and strategic thinking.
meanings.sent4: She approached brokings with a creative and innovative mindset.
meanings.sent5: In the world of brokings, every detail of a deal matters.
